titleStmt.title: A briefe of the Act for the reliefe of the marchants of the estaple.

notesStmt.note: "Requesting permission to sell wool and woolfells in England whenever they are prohibited from trading abroad." -- STC.
Probably in response to STC 8687: By the King. A proclamation for preventing exportation of woolles, woolle-fels, ... .
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
